name: monorepo-root
description: Monorepo chứa 2 project Next.js: Admin và Client

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix Admin" "npm run dev --prefix Client"
scripts.build: concurrently "npm run build --prefix Admin" "npm run build --prefix Client"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start --prefix Admin" "npm run start --prefix Client"
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules Admin/node_modules Client/node_modules Admin/package-lock.json Client/package-lock.json && npm install

author: Quoc Chung
